mods.abstract: Red Elm Park on Madison Avenue was a baseball field. CBC's Coach William "Fatty" McLain negotiated a deal with the Memphis area baseball association to use it for football, Red Elm being the prime location for sports in town at the time. Football practices and games were held there when baseball was not on the schedule.
mods.accessCondition: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law. For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
